channel.title: I'm sharing a Knowledge Base template you can start from for your SaaS
channel.description:
Hi there,
Recently, I've been a bit busy building a Knowledge Base for my bootstrapped SaaS app, using Git, Jekyll, Liquid, Ruby.
Inspired by KissMetrics who did the same at some point (but their setup was a bit too rich for me), I'm sharing the full code I'm using as an [open-source repository][1], from which you can start from.
I also made a fairly detailed write-up of everything I learned in the process (including details such as how to generate screenshots or animated gifs), you can find it here:
https://www.wisecashhq.com/blog/lessons-learned-creating-a-git-based-knowledge-base-for-my-saas-product
A great thing about this is that I can now collaborate with people who are less technical, on a dedicated git repo, without having to open the main git repo of my app source code.
Hope this will be useful to some of you.
-- Thibaut
[1]: https://github.com/wisecash/wisecash-support
